original_text: As for what was sown on rocky ground, this is the one who hears the word and immediately receives it with joy,
korean_text: 돌밭에 뿌려졌다는 것은 말씀을 듣고 즉시 기쁨으로 받되

sentences.original_text: As for what was sown on rocky ground
this is the one who hears the word
and immediately receives it with joy
